comment: Youre not the only one But from a guitar perspective, he really was unbelievable. Very unique style, creative, outside of the box, tasteful, innovative. Listen to the live version of Machine Gun from the Band of Gypsies show or the long version of Voodoo Chile from Electric Ladyland or Born Under A Bad Sign from the recently released Blues album
